humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the largest tumor dimension as 25 mm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for staging cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the size of the largest focus of invasion is 25 mm, which falls in the T2 category. The T2 category includes tumors that are greater than 20 mm in greatest dimension. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
